price: Na mmom εyε nteamu fua pε (na Nyankopͻn maa Ɔbͻfoͻ Gabriel bεteaa mu guu wͻn soͻ), na hwε, wͻn (nyinaa) tεm dinn (a wͻn awuwuo).
arabic: إِن كَانَتۡ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ فَإِذَا هُمۡ خَٰمِدُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: in kānat illā ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan fa-idhā hum khāmidūna
